Introduction

Overview of the package

Table 1: Main functions in lsmetrics.

Type of function Function Description Input Output
Fragment lsm_fragment_area() Calculate fragment area Binary habitat raster Fragment area raster
Patch lsm_patch_area() Calculate patch area Binary habitat raster Patch area raster
